description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: In vsp driver, there is a possible missing verification incorrect input. This could lead to local denial of service with no additional execution privileges needed
En el controlador vsp, es posible que falte una entrada incorrecta de verificación. Esto podría provocar una denegación de servicio local sin necesidad de privilegios de ejecución adicionales.
